title: AI-Integrated Self-Regulated Learning (SRL) Language Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers; language proficiency program for in-service practitioners’ job performance improvement; focus on self-regulated learning strategies using AI tools

learning_goals: Learners can set personalized learning goals using AI tools and develop execution plans on weekly/monthly bases
Learners can enhance self-assessment and monitoring abilities in language learning processes through AI-based feedback systems
Learners can solve language tasks required in real work situations by applying self-regulated learning strategies (goal setting, self-monitoring, resource utilization)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
